summary: Feature request for all-method interceptors or middleware for the TypeScript SDK client. The user wants a simplified way to intercept all communication with the client/worker, similar to Apollo Client's Network Links, particularly for centralized error handling across all methods.
userImpact: Users must currently implement all individual methods in WorkflowClientCallsInterceptor for centralized error handling instead of using a simpler all-method interceptor pattern.
proposedFix: Implement all-method interceptors similar to Apollo Client's Network Links pattern to provide a simpler way to intercept all client/worker communication.
workaround: Users can implement all methods in WorkflowClientCallsInterceptor, or use gRPC interceptors directly.
resolutionDetails: Closed by maintainer (bergundy) with comment that gRPC interceptors can achieve the same result and no additional requests were received.
keyQuote: gRPC interceptors can achieve this IIUC.
